price: ووايه: د الله او رسول تابعداري وکړئ نو كه یې مخ واړولو، نو بېشکه الله کافران نه خوښوي.
arabic: قُلۡ أَطِيعُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَٱلرَّسُولَۖ فَإِن تَوَلَّوۡاْ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: qul aṭīʿū al-laha wal-rasūla fa-in tawallaw fa-inna al-laha lā yuḥibbu al-kāfirīna
